com.fluidops.ajax

Class FSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.FComponentRegistry
      • com.fluidops.ajax.FSession

  • public class FSession
extends FComponentRegistry
    This class represents a UI session with a client. For each new session, all page models are re-instantiated.
    Author:
    uli,as

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      static boolean useErrorPage

    • Field Detail

      • useErrorPage

        public static boolean useErrorPage
        if true (default), AjaxServlet handles a timeout by displaying the page that is registered with the SESSION_EXPIRED page code. if false, AjaxServlet handles a timeout by refreshing the current page. This should be used when the page is a JSP and handles sessions / login / etc. in the backend

        public FPage createNewPage(java.lang.String id,
                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new page model for the given page ID. Looks up the registered page class to instantiate, and returns the new instance. Note: sets the returned page as the current thread local page.

        public FComponent getComponentById(java.lang.String id,
                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
